text: Hobby Japan Inc. is a Japanese publishing company known for publishing and releasing books, magazines, light novels, games, and collectibles. Founded in 1969, the company owns and distributes such publications as the eponymous Hobby Japan magazine, as well as Uchusen. The company has also released a number of role-playing and tabletop games, as well as action figures related to anime and manga franchises. == Role-playing games == * Dungeons & Dragons 3rd, 3.5 and 4th edition (translated) * Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay 2nd edition (translated) * Ring Master I: The Shadow of Filias - Filias Nogisu no Anun (Sharp X68000, 1989) * Ring Master II: Forget You Not, Evermore - Eien Naru Omoi (Sharp X68000, 1990) == Game books == * Queen's Blade * Fighting Fantasy (translated) == Anime == * Queen's Blade * Hyakka Ryōran Samurai Girls * Seven Mortal Sins * Invaders of the Rokujyōma!? == Light novels == * HJ Bunko == Other == * Bikini Warriors == See also == * Charano! * List of game manufacturers == References == ==External links== * Official website Category:1969 establishments in Japan Category:Monthly magazines published in Japan Category:Japanese role-playing games Category:Magazines established in 1969 Category:Manufacturing companies of Japan Category:Mass media companies of Japan
